Package gw.bc.accounting.billinginstruction.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountGeneral
    AccountGeneral Billing instruction used with account
    AcctBillingInstruction
    AcctBillingInstruction Abstract base type for account related billing instructions
    Audit
    Audit Billing instruction used to make changes to an existing policy as part of an audit
    BaseGeneral
    BaseGeneral Common superclass for general billing instruction like things
    BillingInstruction
    BillingInstruction A set of charges
    Cancellation
    Cancellation - Billing instruction used to cancel a policy Handles a cancellation from a policy system.
    CltlBillingInstruction
    CltlBillingInstruction Abstract base type for collateral related billing instructions
    CollateralBI
    CollateralBI Billing instruction used with collateral
    ExistingPlcyPeriodBI
    ExistingPlcyPeriodBI Abstract base type for policy related billing instructions which modify an existing Policy Period
    General
    General General billing instruction for an existing policy
    Issuance
    Issuance Billing instruction used to add a new policy
    NewPlcyPeriodBI
    NewPlcyPeriodBI Abstract base type for policy related billing instructions which create a new policy period
    NewRenewal
    NewRenewal Billing instruction used to add a renewed policy when the policy does not have a prior period in BillingCenter
    OffsetChargeBI
    OffsetChargeBI Billing Instruction that generates a set of offset charges on an Agency Bill PolicyPeriod when that PolicyPeriod is transferred from one producer to another.
    OnsetChargeBI
    OnsetChargeBI Billing Instruction that generates a set of onset charges on an Agency Bill PolicyPeriod when that PolicyPeriod is transferred from one producer to another.
    PlcyBillingInstruction
    PlcyBillingInstruction

    See http://wiki/index.php/BC_BillingInstruction for more information about PlcyBillingInstruction and its subtypes
    PolicyChange
    PolicyChange Billing instruction used to make changes to an existing policy
    PremiumReportBI
    PremiumReportBI Billing instruction used to notify the associated policy period of a premium report
    PremiumReportBIPremiumReportDueDate
    PremiumReportBIPremiumReportDueDate Join table between PremiumReportBI and PremiumReportDueDate, allows only 1 entry per PremiumReportBI
    PremiumReportDDWorkItem
    PremiumReportDDWorkItem A premium report due date work item
    PremiumReportDueDate
    PremiumReportDueDate Billing instruction used to notify the associated policy period of the next premium report's due date
    Reinstatement
    Reinstatement - Billing instruction used to reinstate a policy Handles a reinstatement from a policy system.
    Renewal
    Renewal Billing instruction used to renew a policy
    ReversalBillingInstruction
    ReversalBillingInstruction

    Billing instruction type for reversal charges.
    Rewrite
    Rewrite Billing instruction used to rewrite a policy
    SegregatedCollReqBI
    SegregatedCollReqBI Billing instruction used with collateral
    UpgradeBillingInstructionPaymentPlanWorkItem
    UpgradeBillingInstructionPaymentPlanWorkItem A work item for setting a Policy Billing Instruction's custom payment plan when upgrading from 3.0.2
